name: Gufw
description: Gufw is an Ubuntu built-in firewall UFW graphical management tool that can protect your computer from viruses interference in access to the Internet. Its full Chinese operation interface can easily set the release / stop IP or service, and is very suitable for business computers with higher system completeness requirement to use.

en_US.description: Gufw is an Ubuntu built-in firewall UFW graphical management tool that can protect your computer from viruses interference in access to the Internet. Its full Chinese operation interface can easily set the release / stop IP or service, and is very suitable for business computers with higher system completeness requirement to use.
en_US.name: Gufw

zh_CN.description: Gufw是一款防火墙UFW的图形化管理工具，可以保护您的电脑在接入互联网时免受病毒干扰。其全中文的操作界面，可以方便的设置放行/阻止IP或服务，非常适合对系统完全性要求较高的商务电脑使用。
zh_CN.name: Gufw
